title: Bessica Lefter Bites Back
description: Bessica's settled into middle school life . . . her friendship with Sylvie is back on, she's made some cool new friends, she's dealing with the psycho-bullies, and handling more homework than should ever be allowed. But what's worrying her most these days are her mascot duties. The pressure's on to be the funniest, wildest bear mascot her school's ever seenâ€”and to make sure her rival tiger mascot doesn't humiliate her on the field. Is that even possible?From the Hardcover edition.
author: Kristen Tracy
